Name: Echoes of Nocturnal Chords 夜弦之音
About the game: Game Name: Echoes of Nocturnal Chords Game Type: Horror Puzzle Number of endings: 4 Estimated time for customs clearance: 4 ~ 7 hours Whether to leave rtp: has been detached Game size: 107mb About the game: On a quiet midnight, a famous girl suddenly disappears unexpectedly. The protagonist followed the clue obtained at the girl's house all the way to the back of the mountain, but when they met, something strange happened ... Basic button Move: Arrow keys Investigation / Confirmation: Z / Space / Enter Menu / Cancel: X / ESC Archive Management: F5 Resolution adjustment: F6 Running: Shift About reprint Reprinting is welcome. It is sufficient to indicate the author when reprinting. Please do not post it in your own name. About Live \ Followers Welcome to the live and fan works, if you can not watch the Raiders in live, try not to look at the Raiders, the puzzles are not too difficult. About others The script, design, stand-up drawing and character CG of this game are original. Please do not unpack it yourself. If you have any questions, please contact the author. Try to reply and solve all the problems that everyone has in the game as soon as possible ~ Finally, I wish everyone a happy game ~! !! !!
